channel.title: Posts on Jhony Kaesemodel Pontes
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Jhony Kaesemodel Pontes

item.description: 5 papers I found pretty cool at CVPR 2017 Deep learning human mind for automated visual classification (oral) [Paper] [Project webpage] [Video] A point set generation network for 3D object reconstruction (oral) [Paper] [Project webpage] SurfNet: Generating 3D shape surfaces using deep residual networks (poster) [Paper] [Project webpage] [Video] Learning shape abstractions by assembling volumetric primitives (poster) [Paper] [Project webpage] IM2CAD (spotlight) [Paper] [Project webpage] [Video]

“Most of us take completely for granted our ability to see the world around us. How do we do it seems no great mystery. We just open our eyes and look! When we do, we perceive a complex array of meaningful objects located in three-dimensional space” - Stephen E. Palmer, Vision Science: Photons to Phenomenology.
